AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Andrew P. Graham: Border Patrol Agent who stopped the truck based on suspicious behavior and prior observations, including the truck's unusual hour of departure from the park, its Kansas license plate, lack of a park registration sticker, and the driver's evasive actions
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jay Snodgrass: Border Patrol Agent whose prior observation of the truck was confirmed by Agent Graham, contributing to the determination of suspicious activity
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Brignoni-Ponce Jacquinot: Defendant in a drug trafficking case, exhibited suspicious behavior while driving, sole passenger in the truck, found with 286.44 pounds of marijuana and two unloaded handguns, described as a small-framed person wearing a baseball cap
